attributes.action: Cut all foreign aid to the middle east
attributes.additional_details: Due to the amount of civil unrest in the middle east over the film about the prophet Mohammed I strongly believe that we should cut all funding to these countries as they have shown what I believe to be the cancer of modern society. We should not continue to help these countries as they show a huge intolerance to western values and our culture ESPECIALLY we should stop funding as we are infact as a nation struggling.
